languages.text: {n}Найденный среди заключенных человек не был санкционированным псайкером, но обладал достаточной степенью одаренности, чтобы свершить ритуал, переданный на колонию Идирой. Копаясь в кишках мертвецов и бормоча, он узрел темную фигуру, что свершила сие злодеяние. Пусть он и не смог описать ее ясно, так как видение это лишило его разума и обратило в обмочившегося идиота, было очевидно, что это — не человек. Мятеж угас.{/n}

{n}The psyker found among the prisoners was not sanctioned, but he was gifted enough to perform the ritual according to the instructions sent by Idira. While digging through the intestines of the dead bodies and mumbling to himself, he beheld the dark figure that had committed this vile deed. The vision stripped away his mind, leaving him an incontinent loon. Although he was unable to describe it clearly, it was still obvious that the figure was not human. The riot has subsided.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Найденный среди заключенных человек не был санкционированным псайкером, но обладал достаточной степенью одаренности, чтобы свершить ритуал, переданный на колонию Идирой. Копаясь в кишках мертвецов и бормоча, он узрел темную фигуру, что свершила сие злодеяние. Пусть он и не смог описать ее ясно, так как видение это лишило его разума и обратило в обмочившегося идиота, было очевидно, что это — не человек. Мятеж угас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The man found among the prisoners was not a sanctioned psyker, but was gifted enough to perform the ritual passed to the colony by Idira. While digging through the intestines of the dead body and mumbling something to himself, he had seen the dark figure that had done this vile deed. Although he could not describe it clearly, as the vision had stripped his mind away and turned him into an idiot who wet himself, it was clear that the figure was not human. The riot had subsided.{/n}

{n}The man found among the prisoners was not a sanctioned psyker, but was gifted enough to perform the ritual passed to the colony by Idira. The riot had subsided.{/n}

languages.text: {n}守卫在囚犯之中找到了一位非法灵能者，他拥有足够的力量，可以按照伊迪拉的指示进行仪式。他在众多尸体的内脏之中挖来挖去，喃喃自语，看到了犯下这一恶行的黑影。他看到的幻象夺走了他的理智，把他变成了无法自理的疯子。尽管这个灵能者无法清楚地描述凶手的样子，但很显然，这个凶手并不是人类。在这之后，暴乱便平息了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker found among the prisoners was not sanctioned, but he was gifted enough to perform the ritual according to the instructions sent by Idira. While digging through the intestines of the dead bodies and mumbling to himself, he beheld the dark figure that had committed this vile deed. The vision stripped away his mind, leaving him an incontinent loon. Although he was unable to describe it clearly, it was still obvious that the figure was not human. The riot has subsided.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}守卫在囚犯之中找到了一位非法灵能者，他拥有足够的力量，可以按照伊迪拉的指示进行仪式。他在众多尸体的内脏之中挖来挖去，喃喃自语，看到了犯下这一恶行的黑影。他看到的幻象夺走了他的理智，把他变成了无法自理的疯子。尽管这个灵能者无法清楚地描述凶手的样子，但很显然，这个凶手并不是人类。在这之后，暴乱便平息了下来。{/n}
{n}守卫在囚犯之中找到了一位非法灵能者，他拥有足够的力量，可以执行伊迪拉指派给他的仪式。他在尸体的内脏里挖来挖去，喃喃自语，看到了犯下这一恶行的黑影。他看到的幻象夺走了他的理智，把他变成了一个生活无法自理的疯子。尽管这个灵能者无法清楚地描述凶手的样子，但很显然，这个凶手并不是人类。在这之后，暴乱便平息了下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El psíquico encontrado entre los prisioneros no estaba autorizado, pero era lo bastante hábil como para realizar el ritual siguiendo las instrucciones de Idira. Al escarbar entre los intestinos de los cadáveres y murmurar para sus adentros, observó la figura oscura que había cometido este terrible acto. La visión le hizo perder la cordura y lo convirtió en un lunático incontinente. Aunque fue incapaz de describirla con claridad, era evidente que la figura no era humana. La revuelta se ha sofocado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker found among the prisoners was not sanctioned, but he was gifted enough to perform the ritual according to the instructions sent by Idira. While digging through the intestines of the dead bodies and mumbling to himself, he beheld the dark figure that had committed this vile deed. The vision stripped away his mind, leaving him an incontinent loon. Although he was unable to describe it clearly, it was still obvious that the figure was not human. The riot has subsided.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El psíquico encontrado entre los prisioneros no estaba autorizado, pero era lo bastante hábil como para realizar el ritual siguiendo las instrucciones de Idira. Al escarbar entre los intestinos de los cadáveres y murmurar para sus adentros, observó la figura oscura que había cometido este terrible acto. La visión le hizo perder la cordura y lo convirtió en un lunático incontinente. Aunque fue incapaz de describirla con claridad, era evidente que la figura no era humana. La revuelta se ha sofocado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}囚人の中にいた異能者は認定異能者ではなかったが、イディラの指示通りに儀式を行えるほどの能力を持っていた。彼は、遺体から内臓をほじくり出しながら、ぶつぶつと独り言をつぶやいていたとき、この卑劣な行為を犯した黒い影を見た。その幻影は彼の心を奪い去り、失禁し放心状態になってしまった。現在、彼はその光景をはっきりと描写することはできないものの、その姿が人間でないことは明白だった。暴動は沈静化した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker found among the prisoners was not sanctioned, but he was gifted enough to perform the ritual according to the instructions sent by Idira. While digging through the intestines of the dead bodies and mumbling to himself, he beheld the dark figure that had committed this vile deed. The vision stripped away his mind, leaving him an incontinent loon. Although he was unable to describe it clearly, it was still obvious that the figure was not human. The riot has subsided.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人の中にいた男は認定異能者ではなかったが、イディラからコロニーに送られ、儀式を行えるほどの能力を持っていた。彼は、遺体から内臓をほじくり出しながら、ぶつぶつと独り言をつぶやいていたとき、この卑劣な行為を犯した黒い影を見た。その幻影は彼の心を奪い去り、失禁し放心状態になってしまった。現在、彼はその光景をはっきりと描写することはできないものの、その姿が人間でないことは明白だった。暴動は沈静化した。{/n}

{n}囚人の中にいた男は認定異能者ではなかったが、イディラからコロニーに送られ、儀式を行えるほどの能力を持っていた。彼は、遺体から内臓をほじくり出しながら、ぶつぶつと独り言をつぶやいていたとき、この卑劣な行為を犯した黒い影を見た。その幻影は彼の心を奪い去り、失禁し放心状態になってしまった。現在、彼はその光景をはっきりと描写することはできないものの、その姿が人間でないことは明白だった。暴動は沈静化した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le psyker qu'ils trouvent parmi les détenus n'est pas assermenté, mais suffisamment doué pour effectuer le rituel recommandé par Idira. En farfouillant dans les boyaux des cadavres et en marmonnant dans sa barbe, l'homme finit par entrevoir la sombre silhouette qui a commis ces horribles meurtres. La vision lui fait perdre la raison et, bien qu'il ne peut décrire clairement ce qu'il a vu, il semble évident qu'il ne s'agissait pas d'un être humain. L'émeute se calme d'elle-même.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker found among the prisoners was not sanctioned, but he was gifted enough to perform the ritual according to the instructions sent by Idira. While digging through the intestines of the dead bodies and mumbling to himself, he beheld the dark figure that had committed this vile deed. The vision stripped away his mind, leaving him an incontinent loon. Although he was unable to describe it clearly, it was still obvious that the figure was not human. The riot has subsided.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le psyker qu'ils trouvent parmi les détenus n'est pas assermenté, mais suffisamment doué pour effectuer le rituel recommandé par Idira. En farfouillant dans les boyaux des cadavres et en marmonnant dans sa barbe, l'homme finit par entrevoir la sombre silhouette qui a commis ces horribles meurtres. La vision lui fait perdre la raison et, bien qu'il ne peut décrire clairement ce qu'il a vu, il semble évident qu'il ne s'agissait pas d'un être humain. L'émeute se calme d'elle-même.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Psioniker, der unter den Gefangenen gefunden wurde, war zwar nicht sanktioniert, aber begabt genug, um das Ritual gemäß Idiras Anweisungen durchzuführen. Als er murmelnd die Eingeweide der Toten durchwühlte, sah er die dunkle Gestalt, die diese schändliche Tat begangen hatte. Die Vision raubte ihm den Verstand und verwandelte ihn in einen inkontinenten Irren. Er war zwar nicht mehr in der Lage, die Gestalt genau zu beschreiben, aber es war dennoch offensichtlich, dass sie kein Mensch war. Der Aufstand hat sich gelegt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker found among the prisoners was not sanctioned, but he was gifted enough to perform the ritual according to the instructions sent by Idira. While digging through the intestines of the dead bodies and mumbling to himself, he beheld the dark figure that had committed this vile deed. The vision stripped away his mind, leaving him an incontinent loon. Although he was unable to describe it clearly, it was still obvious that the figure was not human. The riot has subsided.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Psioniker, der unter den Gefangenen gefunden wurde, war zwar nicht sanktioniert, aber begabt genug, um das Ritual gemäß Idiras Anweisungen durchzuführen. Als er murmelnd die Eingeweide der Toten durchwühlte, sah er die dunkle Gestalt, die diese schändliche Tat begangen hatte. Die Vision raubte ihm den Verstand und verwandelte ihn in einen inkontinenten Irren. Er war zwar nicht mehr in der Lage, die Gestalt genau zu beschreiben, aber es war dennoch offensichtlich, dass sie kein Mensch war. Der Aufstand hat sich gelegt.{/n}

{n}Der Mann, der unter den Gefangenen gefunden wurde, war zwar kein sanktionierter Psioniker, war aber begabt genug, um das Ritual durchzuführen, das Idira an die Kolonie geschickt hatte. Während er die Eingeweide der Toten durchwühlte und dabei etwas vor sich hinmurmelte, sah er die dunkle Gestalt, die diese schändliche Tat begangen hatte. Die Vision raubte ihm den Verstand, er wurde zu einem inkontinenten Wahnsinnigen. Er war zwar nicht mehr in der Lage, die Gestalt genau zu beschreiben, aber es war klar, dass sie kein Mensch war. Der Aufstand legte sich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mahkûmların arasından seçilen ruhsezer, onaylı olmasa da İdira'nın ilettiği talimatlara göre ayini gerçekleştirecek lütfa sahipti. Cesetlerin bağırsaklarını kurcalayıp kendi kendine mırıldanırken bu feci suçu işleyen karanlık figürle karşılaştı. Görüyle birlikte aklını yitiren adam, sidiğini tutamayan bir ahmak hâline geldi. Gördüğünü açık seçik anlatamasa da figürün insan olmadığı belliydi. Böylece isyan da dinmiş oldu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The psyker found among the prisoners was not sanctioned, but he was gifted enough to perform the ritual according to the instructions sent by Idira. While digging through the intestines of the dead bodies and mumbling to himself, he beheld the dark figure that had committed this vile deed. The vision stripped away his mind, leaving him an incontinent loon. Although he was unable to describe it clearly, it was still obvious that the figure was not human. The riot has subsided.{/n}
